events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and started processing their resume.
The application has been categorized under the engineering department focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter specialized in engineering hires has been assigned to manage the candidate's application and next steps.
Conducted the initial screening call with the candidate to evaluate their experience and fit for the software engineer role.
Received a positive response from the candidate confirming their interest and availability for the next interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview with strong performance in algorithm design and coding.
Scheduled the HR interview to discuss cultural fit, career goals, and compensation expectations with the candidate.
HR interview completed; candidate demonstrated alignment with company values and expressed enthusiasm for the role.
An employment offer was proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits tailored to their profile.
The candidate responded positively to the offer and provided feedback confirming acceptance pending final review.
Candidate has formally accepted the job offer and is excited to begin their journey as a software engineer.
The onboarding process has begun with orientation sessions and technical setup scheduled for the new hire.
The recruitment case is now closed; the candidate has successfully joined the engineering team.
